title: Understanding Power View
text: Power View is a feature in Excel that allows users to create interactive data visualizations. It is part of the Power BI suite of tools.

title: Features of Power View
text: Power View provides a drag-and-drop interface for rapid model building, allowing users to create interactive charts, graphs, and maps.

hintAnswer: creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
title: Identifying the Correct Function
text: Which of the following best describes the function of Power View?
choices: extracts, connects, refines, and transforms large amounts of data into Excel files
enables you to import and compare large amounts of data from multiple sources to build analytical relationships
creates an interactive visualization tool used to provide a $$drag-and-drop$$ interface for rapid model building
combines other Power Tools with other features to find and visualize data, share, and collaborate
